website_summaries.verdict: Unlike many natural washes, this formula gives you plenty of sulfate-free suds, thanks to its coconut base.
pros: Plant-based cleanser made from coconut with watermelon
Uses pink Himalayan sea salt to help with pH balance
No parabens, sulfates, dyes, or perfumes
cons: May not be good for children with eczema
Some find the scent too mild

product_meta.title: Puracy Natural Children's Body Wash, Watermelon & Sea Salt, Hypoallergenic Kid’s Shower Gel, 12-Ounce (2-Pack)
product_meta.description:
Puracy Natural Children’s Body Wash is balanced with the right amount of cleaning, moisturizing, and natural fragrance to make bathing a fun finish to the day. Your child will experience plenty of suds, softer skin, and a renewed love for their nighttime ritual. We designed it to be versatile enough to wash every body part. 



Packed in this world-class blend of ingredients is Pink Himalayan Sea Salt, which naturally balances your child’s skin. This thick liquid formula also features Coco Glycinate, an exclusive coconut-based surfactant which produces lot of foam without disrupting the stratum corneum layer of your skin. When you disrupt this layer with a needlessly harsh cleanser, you create irritation, dryness, and redness. Our formula thoroughly cleans yet leaves this crucial layer unfazed. This allows your child’s skin to feel soft, fresh, and moisturized. 

Designed for children to be used as a daily body wash, shower gel, or bubble bath. This clinical-grade formula is safe for those with sensitive skin or skin conditions such as eczema and dermatitis. The sweet, youthful aromas will leave your child smiling throughout their bathing experience. It smells so good, you may even want to use it yourself. The food-grade, plant and mineral-based ingredients were carefully chosen and developed into a premium solution by Puracy, a trusted source for natural and organic, plant-based, child & pet safe, hypoallergenic, and effective household essentials. The proprietary blend of renewable ingredients is family friendly and free from harsh chemicals and fumes. This product is 99.95% Natural, per Puracy’s ‘What Natural Means to Us’ definition available on our website.
feature_bullets: The Puracy Difference: Join the 5+ million enjoying our award-winning, plant-powered formulas

EXTRA BUBBLES, NO SULFATES: Coconut-based cleansers create rich, luxurious foam; clinical-grade moisturizers hydrate; sea salt purifies and balances; 100% clean rinsing; WATERMELON & SEA SALT: A slice of fresh watermelon while playing on the beach

CREATED BY DOCTORS: Developed for daily use by children, with all skin types, by our team of Ph.D. chemists; Removes dirt, enhances skin hydration, and washes away completely, leaving your child’s skin soft and clean

NO HARSH CHEMICALS: No sulfates (SLS, SLES, SCS), gluten, triclosan, formaldehyde, salicylates, parabens, phosphates, MEA, DEA, TEA, petroleum-based ingredients, animal by-products, perfumes, dyes or caustics

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Naturally derived, non-toxic, hypoallergenic, vegan, gluten-free, biodegradable; Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA & Leaping Bunny - Never Tested on Animals; Made in the USA!
